name: Simon Campbell
bio: Simon is a digital journalist specializing in data and narrative writing.

name: Yutao Chen
bio: Yutao is a visual journalist who shoots, edits and codes.

name: Yingshan Deng
bio: Yingshan is a multimedia reporter focusing on business and science.

name: Sarah El Safty
bio: Sarah is a multimedia journalist with experience covering business across several markets in the US and the Middle East.

name: Francesca Fenzi
bio: Francesca Fenzi is an audio producer, writer, and visual journalist based in Oakland.

name: Saemmool Lee
bio: Saemmool is a multimedia reporter from South Korea, focusing on business and technology.

name: Cecilia Lei
bio: Cecilia is a multimedia journalist focused on enterprise reporting, with a concentration in criminal justice and immigration.

name: Susie Neilson
bio: Susie is a science reporter specializing in data, audio and public records.

name: Mallory Newman
bio: Mallory is a multimedia reporter focused on video and investigative journalism.

name: Alex Nieves
bio: Alex is a multimedia journalist focusing on politics and environment reporting.

name: Josh Slowiczek
bio: Josh is a Bay Area reporter focusing on multimedia, data and investigative journalism.

name: Anne Wernikoff
bio: Anne is a multimedia journalist and documentary photographer. Her work focuses on sense of place, family and community.
